phrs.translation: 允许, 人的出生, 给予

sentences.sentence: Vouchsafe me a spirit of faith and knowledge.
sentences.translation: 赐予我信心和一颗有知识的心灵。

sentences.sentence: God of the all-round light, please vouchsafe the strength that we are not encroached on evilly, in front of the goodness shield, all the evil spirits will be drive away!
sentences.translation: 全能的光明之神啊，请赐予我们不受邪恶侵害的力量，在至善的灵盾面前，所有邪魔都将远离！
